title: SmartCubeCoin
author: SmartCubeCoin
created_time: September 07, 2022, 10:12:02 PMLast edit: September 07, 2022, 10:54:24 PM by SmartCubeCoin
content: SmartCubeA fast solution to decentralized and anonymous PaymentsLaunch DateSeptember 5, 2022  http://smartcubecoin.sitehttp://smartcubecoin.site/roadmap.htmlhttps://discord.gg/invite/Cry6Jmb5Ka----- About SmartCube -----SmartCube is a peer to peer decentralized cryptocurrency coin that aims on fast and anonymous payments.We are a community based cryptocurrency and listen to all inputs from our community!We plan to launch a mining platform, SmartCube creditcard payment processor, masternodes andmuch more in the upcoming months/years. Created by the people for the people.----- Specifications -----Symbol:Algorithm:                  Total Coin Supply:Block Time:Block Reward:Difficulty Retarget:PoW Mining:Premine:XSCChukwa/Argon2id30,000,000 XSC15 Seconds3 XSC (halving every year)Every BlockCPU/GPU (ASIC Resistant)600,000 XSC----- Masternode Plan -----SmartCube Masternodes provide a 2nd layer of security to the network by providing additional nodes to validate blocks, transactions and creditcard transactions. Masternode owners are rewarded for their service to the network, with a portion of the block reward being sent to a masternode. There reward will increase overtime the more they are trusted on thenetwork. Masternodes are also given voting rights to participate in project decisions.You will be able to pre order a masternode right now. Pre ordering a masternode will give you multiple benefits:- You will given a special 'Investor' role- You will be listed on the website as a contributor- You will be getting +5% reward bonus (If masternode reward is 4% - 5% it will be increased to 9% - 10%)- You will get beta/alpha access to all of our ongoing projects- Free SmartCube creditcard and payment processor on release- SmartCube Raspberry Pi 4 Mini Node (device)Masternodes will be usable in Q1 of 2023.* Please send me a message in discord for a purchase. Payable in BTC, USDT, ETH, LTC or any other valuable currency.SmartCube Masternode LightCode:Cost: 0.0075 BTC (On release: 20,000 XSC)Rewards a month: ~4% - ~6% (~800 XSC - ~1,200 XSC)SmartCube Masternode MediumCode:Cost: 0.015 BTC (On release: 25,000 XSC)Rewards a month: ~9% - ~13% (~2,250 XSC - ~3,250 XSC)SmartCube Masternode HeavyCode:Cost: 0.03 BTC (On release: 35,000 XSC)Rewards a month: ~20% - ~24% (~7,000 XSC - ~8,400 XSC)----- Links -----Websitehttp://smartcubecoin.siteRoadmaphttp://smartcubecoin.site/roadmap.htmlPoolhttp://pool.smartcubecoin.siteAsia Poolhttp://pool-asia.smartcubecoin.siteExplorerhttp://explorer.smartcubecoin.siteDiscordhttps://discord.gg/invite/Cry6Jmb5KaTwitterhttps://twitter.com/SmartCubeCoinGithubhttps://github.com/SmartCubeCoin/SmartCubePaper Wallet Generatorhttp://paper.smartcubecoin.site/----- Software Releases -----SmartCube Codebasehttps://github.com/SmartCubeCoin/SmartCube/releases/latestSmartCube GUI Wallethttps://github.com/SmartCubeCoin/smartcube-wallet-proton/releases/latest----- Tutorials -----Mining with NinjaRig (How to mine SmartCube)http://docs.smartcubecoin.site/#/mining_with_ninjarig

comments.body: Hahaha another chukwa scam from same devs. Beware, they will use your hashrate to mine on another pool different coin.
